feed.title: My thoughts on the viability of the Factom token

entry.title: My thoughts on the viability of the Factom token
entry.summary: On a Bitcoin mailing list, Brian Deery shared a link to an archived thread on Reddit discussing the launch of Factom's software token. Peter Todd requested that Deery explicitly list what he believes Factom prevents from happening as its primary function is security software. Todd suggested being specific about the guarantees one expects from the Factom system.
